${ModID}:Bullet.NAME: Bullet
${ModID}:Bullet.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Wicked. Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:MysticFlourish.NAME: Tetsuzanko
${ModID}:MysticFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your next orbs passive twice.

${ModID}:CrystalMoonlight.NAME: Crystal Moonlight
${ModID}:CrystalMoonlight.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Dark. NL Gain !M! Focus this turn.

${ModID}:ChitteringPunt.NAME: Bullet Climax
${ModID}:ChitteringPunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Add a *Bullet to your hand.
${ModID}:ChitteringPunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Add !M! *Bullets to your hand.

${ModID}:FullMoonHalo.NAME: Full Moon Halo
${ModID}:FullMoonHalo.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Wicked. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Focus this turn.

${ModID}:MoonlightBarrage.NAME: Moonlight Barrage
${ModID}:MoonlightBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each channeled Orb. NL Channel !M! ${ModID}:Dark.

${ModID}:HornetWithin.NAME: Hornet Within
${ModID}:HornetWithin.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Focus this turn. NL Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Arcane.

${ModID}:WitchTwist.NAME: Witch Twist
${ModID}:WitchTwist.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Wicked. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Bullets to your hand.

${ModID}:MoonlightFlight.NAME: Moon River
${ModID}:MoonlightFlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Arcane. NL Whenever you channel an Orb, gain !M! Focus until your next turn.

${ModID}:ScarabPlague.NAME: Portal Kick
${ModID}:ScarabPlague.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak and Lock-On. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Arcane.
